title: AI-Driven Accounting Education and Creative Instructional Design Through Reflective Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of fundamental accounting concepts and proficiency in digital tool utilization
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented training for professionals to enhance competency in utilizing AI tools in accounting.

learning_goals: Learners can perform decision-making using AI tools (generative AI, data analysis platforms) in accounting data analysis with 80% accuracy.
Learners can structure and present AI utilization strategies in accounting problem-solving processes at least three times through reflective thinking journaling.
Learners can reduce the time required to perform accounting task simulations in VR simulations by 20% by incorporating AI-based learning feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
